info.title: Frankfurter API
info.description: The Frankfurter API tracks foreign exchange reference rates

get.description: Rates quote against the Euro by default. You can quote against other currencies using the 'from' parameter. You can limit returned rates to specified values using the 'to' parameter.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The currency code to quote against

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Comma-separated currency codes to limit the returned rates to

200.description: Successful response with the latest rates

get.summary: Get historical rates for a specific date
get.description: You can tweak the response using the 'from' and 'to' parameters.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve historical rates in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The currency code to convert from

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Comma-separated currency codes to limit the returned rates to

get.summary: Get historical rates for a time period
get.description: If you omit the end date, Frankfurter returns all dates up to the present. You can use the 'to' parameter to limit the result to rates you are interested in.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for the time period in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for the time period in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Comma-separated currency codes to limit the returned rates to

200.description: Successful response with historical rates for the time period

get.summary: Get a list of available currency symbols along with their full names

200.description: Successful response with a list of available currencies
